verbs.description: [V: suring] [ARG1: man] gets probation for threatening rampage at oconto county courthouse the facebook post said his ak 47 is loaded with 500 rounds of ammo but jody wendt told his lawyer he does n't have any guns judge david miron jody a wendt oconto county kevin christensen oconto county court oconto county courthouse oconto county wisconsin facebook oconto police edward burke jody a wendt marinette county courthouse
